hero.title: Pioneering the Digital Future
hero.subtitle: In a world moving at light speed, Al-Barq is your premier technical partner. Digital creativity and technical expertise meet here to turn your ideas into dazzling reality.

about.title: About Us
about.heading: Your Partners in Digital Success
about.desc: We are not just a software agency, but a laboratory for digital creativity, where deep technical expertise meets innovative artistic vision.
about.vision_desc: To be the first choice for ambitious companies in the UAE, by providing solutions that combine artistic creativity and technical excellence.
about.why_desc: Because we believe every idea deserves to come to light. We commit to speed, precision, and aesthetics in every line of code we write.

services.title: Our Services
services.heading: Integrated Solutions for Your Growth
services.web_dev_desc: Fast, secure, and responsive websites using the latest technologies.
services.ui_ux_desc: Modern user interfaces focused on user experience and aesthetic design.
services.mobile_app_desc: Professional iOS and Android apps serving your project goals.
services.digital_marketing_desc: Strategic marketing plans to increase sales and reach your target audience.
services.ecommerce_desc: Integrated e-commerce solutions (WooCommerce, Shopify) to boost your sales.
services.gaming_desc: Interactive and immersive game experiences for mobile and web.
services.cms_desc: Custom CMS solutions (WordPress, Joomla) for easy content management.
services.bots_desc: Smart chatbots for customer service and task automation.
